review: Came very fast! Love it, easy to install and use  So many shows to see, can't say enough good about it!!
author: Debra Shea

review: Best purchase this year!  So much easier than streaming thru Blu-Ray player. Only regret is not being able to use voice control anywhere except Amazon Prime. Great being able to use closed captioning that was not available thru DVD
author: psreview

review: I already have 2 Rokus but needed another for a new TV that did not have Amazon on the "smart list." This was a great choice over the Roku. So much faster than the Rokus response wise. I haven't used the voice command yet. I always forget it's there. Hopefully the Amazon Echo will control it since I placed them in the same room.
author: Judo

review: Amazon compares Fire TV to Netflix but I have found cost wise per movie to not be as good for movies as Netflix.  Also Amazon needs to isolate the free stuff from the paid stuff on Fire TV.  I do like the verbal search feature on the remote because it saves the frustration of having to type in a search on remote which is not designed well this purpose.
